group_1.narration: Juri Ooba, the leader of Ryuugasaki, @has declared war on us!
If she is still the same person I knew, @she could strike at any time!
Nobody is to be alone after school! @Be prepared to fight at a moment's notice!

group_1.textLeft: Did you get the message from Yuna?

group_1.textRight: Yeah, it seems like Ryuugasaki is really serious about this...

group_1.textLeft: It must be because they found out that we lost the Horse... Do you think we can really handle them @without her?

group_1.textRight: Don't give up before the fight even starts.
We've never even seen the Horse ourselves, so what difference does it make if we lost her?

group_1.textLeft: That's true...

group_1.textRight: When you think of it that way, it's not like things are any different now than they were before.

group_1.narration: There will be an emergency meeting later today. @Everyone, please meet up at base by 4 PM. If you cannot @make it, I will catch you up on the details later.
Also, keep away from East Oogibashi, Monzenbashi, and @West Oogibashi. Those bridges connect Torayamachi and @Ryuugasaki territory, so they are extremely dangerous.

group_1.textRight: [chara:800100:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Hang on, Prez! We have a meeting to go to!

group_1.textLeft: I know that.
But I have some personal matters to attend to.
I hate to say this, but I will likely be @missing school quite often from now on.
Please don't think that I'm abandoning my responsibilities.

group_1.textRight: I see... [chara:800100:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:800100:cheek_0][chara:800100:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json][chara:800100:lipSynch_1]Don't worry about it.
Even if you're not here, nobody would think you're skipping.
Because you're the one who made this school a @better place for all of us.

group_1.textLeft: Thank you.

group_1.textRight: I'd say we're still strong enough to put up a good @fight against Ryuugasaki...
I don't think fighting is the best option right now, though.
Since Juri's leading them, a lot of them are probably dissatisfied with her leadership.
You think we might be able to convince them to join @our side?

group_1.textLeft: That seems unrealistic...

group_1.textRight: I was on the same team as Juri before she @split off from us.
She had a strong influence and took care of her girls.

group_1.textLeft: She may look unlikeable, but she actually @gets along with more people than one would expect.

group_1.textRight: So if we tried to get her girls to defect, they'd @probably report it to her right away, huh...

group_1.textLeft: I can't deny that...

group_1.textRight: How about we lure them into our territory and fight with guerrilla warfare?
Even if our numbers are even, we know the neighborhood inside and out.

group_1.textLeft: If we start with our backs against the wall like that, @we'll end up cornered.
We might crumble before they do...
Well...if I were her, I would probably...
...Perhaps we should use the bridges.

group_1.textRight: Um, sorry to interrupt the meeting. Do you mind?

group_1.textLeft: What is it?

group_1.textRight: I brought a girl who wants to join us.

group_1.textLeft: Where did she come from?

group_1.textRight: ...Ryuugasaki.

group_1.textLeft: Alright, bring her in.
What is your name?

group_1.textRight: It's Hikaru Kirari...!@[chara:102200:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:102200:cheek_0][chara:102200:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json][chara:102200:lipSynch_1]Um, sorry to turn up so suddenly...
Yuna...
It's way too dangerous to have a girl from @Ryuugasaki around.

group_1.textLeft: ...We were just discussing how to deal with @Ryuugasaki.
How do you think Juri Ooba will act?

group_1.textRight: Um...
Well...

group_1.textCenter: I don't think Juri's good at calculating or enjoys @plotting. Basically, she's, uh...
How should I put this? She usually focuses on one target and puts everything into takin' them down.
She'd come at you head-on, regardless of the @location. Residential area, business district, @anywhere.
So she and her girls will probably go after whoever @they can find.
Though I'm sure that you're the one who Juri wants @to take down most of all...

group_1.textRight: Yuna Kureha.

group_1.textCenter: Sounds like we're on the same page about Juri.

group_1.textLeft: Very well, then. Welcome to Torayamachi.
Now let's get down to business. You'll be helping us @as well, Hikaru.

group_1.textRight: Aye!

group_1.textLeft: The rest of you, go find some stones and start putting your magic into them.

group_1.narration: There are three bridges between Torayamachi and Ryuugasaki @territory. West Oogibashi, East Oogibashi, and Monzenbashi.
The plan is to use those bridges @to funnel the enemy where we want them.

group_1.textLeft: Welcome to the team, Hikaru Kirari.

group_1.textRight: Th-thanks!

group_1.textLeft: I have a favor to ask of you.

group_1.textRight: What's that...?

group_1.textLeft: Keep an eye on the Grief Seeds we have at our base.
